EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-11-01-Tampa.Tampa Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} You're Invited, {{my.Event Title:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-tampabay/]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, 
 
We'd like to cordially invite you to an exclusive networking event in {{my.Event City:default=}} on {{my.Event Date Long:default=}} at the {{my.Event Location:default=}} to watch the Tampa Bay Lightning take on the Nashville Predators!
 
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly.
 
{{my.Event Title:default=}}
{{my.Event Location:default=}}

{{my.Event Date Long:default=}} | {{my.Start Time:default=}}
 
We hope you will join us by registering here <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-tampabay/]]>.
 
 
Sincerely,
{{my.Event Owner Email:default=Team Turbonomic}}
